Returns: Whether to enable the use of sockets for sending/receiving data.
isSocketEnabled().Description: Indicates whether to enable the use of sockets for sending/receiving data.

getVariant().Description: Retrieves the (optional) developer-controlled parameter describing the type of game to play. Must be either a positive integer or @B_com#google#android#gms#games#multiplayer#realtime#Room#ROOM_VARIANT_DEFAULT_E@ if not desired.

Returns: The @B_com#google#android#gms#games#multiplayer#realtime#RoomStatusUpdateListener_E@ that is called when the room status has changed.
getRoomStatusUpdateListener().Description: Retrieves the listener for the room status changes.

Returns: A bundle of auto-match criteria data.
Parameters: Exclusive bitmasks for the automatching request. The logical AND of each pairing of automatching requests must equal zero for auto-match. If there are no exclusivity requirements for the game, this value should just be set to 0.
createAutoMatchCriteria(int, int, long).Description: Creates an auto-match criteria Bundle for a new invitation. Can be passed to @B_com#google#android#gms#games#multiplayer#realtime#RoomConfig#Builder#setAutoMatchCriteria_E@.
createAutoMatchCriteria(int, int, long).FullName: public static Bundle createAutoMatchCriteria (int minAutoMatchPlayers, int maxAutoMatchPlayers, long exclusiveBitMask)

Parameters: The listener to be invoked when the primary state of the room changes.
builder(com.google.android.gms.games.mul.Description: Creates a builder for assembling a @B_com#google#android#gms#games#multiplayer#realtime#RoomConfig_E@. The provided listener is required, and must not be null. It will be invoked on the main thread when appropriate.

Returns: The criteria for auto-matching one or more players for the room.
getAutoMatchCriteria().Description: Retrieves the criteria for auto-matching one or more players for the room.

Returns: The listener that is called when operations complete.
getRoomUpdateListener().Description: Retrieves the listener that is called when operations complete.

Returns: The player IDs to invite to the room.
getInvitedPlayerIds().Description: Retrieves the player IDs to invite to the room.

Returns: The ID of the invitation to accept.
getInvitationId().Description: Retrieves the ID of the invitation to accept, if any. This is necessary when calling @B_com#google#android#gms#games#multiplayer#realtime#RealTimeMultiplayer#join_E@.

Returns: The @B_com#google#android#gms#games#multiplayer#realtime#RealTimeMessageReceivedListener_E@ that is called when the client has received a message from a peer.
getMessageReceivedListener().Description: Retrieves the listener for message received from a peer.
